text: (tavada) “niyata vasayenma ma ovunva margaya værada yamata salasvannemi. ovunta (puhu) visvasayan æti kara, (yaksayin venuven prarthana karanu læbu elu, gava, otuvan adi) satunge kan kapa damana lesatada ovunva polambavannemi. allahge utpadanayan gæna bheda æti karavana lesatada niyata vasayenma ma ovunva polambavannemi” (yayida kiveya). ebævin kavurun allah misa, (mevæni) seyitanavarunva (tamanta) araksakayin bavata pat kara ganneda, ohu niyata vasayenma pæhædili paduvama at kara ganneya
